edge: The production of the film began in Mumbai, Maharashtra.
The film was shot at several different locations in the Indian state of Uttarakhand during production.
The scenes in Kargil were shot in Ladakh during production.
Parts of the film centered around Hrithik Roshan's military training were also shot at the Indian Military Academy in Dehradun during production.
Actual Indian Army officers also participated in the shooting of the film during production.
Seeing both the actors and officers in the same getup, at times Preity Zinta would get confused separating the actual officers from the actors during production.
Pankaj Tripathi shot for the film at Ladakh with Roshan during production, and this news went viral in Tripathi's village.
But Tripathi's role was all cut during the editing and he was very disappointed to see that his role was cut from the film.
